## Location

```{r,eval=TRUE,include=FALSE}
library(yaml)
library(leaflet)

# set location in _site.yml
loc <- yaml::read_yaml("_site.yml")$location

if(loc=="lund") {
  dfr <- data.frame(lat=55.713394,
                    lon=13.206628,
                    label="Venue",
                    address="<b>Department of Biology</b>,Building D, Room Retina D227, Sölvegatan 35,Lund Sweden",
                    description="For Lund city buses, regional buses and regional trains, [click here](https://www.skanetrafiken.se/).                     stringsAsFactors=F)
}

if(loc=="umea") {
  dfr <- data.frame(lat=63.820019,
                    lon=20.307814,
```

```{r,eval=TRUE,echo=FALSE,chunk.title=NULL}
if(loc!="online") {
  dfr$address <- sapply(dfr$address,function(x) paste(unlist(strsplit(x,split=",")),collapse="<br>"))
  leaflet(height=450,width="auto") %>%
    addTiles(urlTemplate='http://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png') %>%
    addMarkers(lat=dfr$lat,lng=dfr$lon,label=dfr$label,popup=dfr$address) %>%
    setView(lat=dfr$lat[1],lng=dfr$lon[1],zoom=15)
}
```

## Contact

This workshop is run by the **National Bioinformatics Infrastructure Sweden (NBIS)** in collaboration with **National Genomics Infrastructure (NGI)**. Both, NGI and NBIS are platforms at SciLifeLab.

If you would like to get in touch with us regarding this workshop, please contact us at **edu.intro-ngs [at] nbis.se**.
